plot: Elke, Ruth and Monica live together in the same house. Elke is a sexologist, her best friend Ruth wants to be a famous reporter. Monica is one of Elke's most active clients: she's rich, divorced and enjoys her freedom.
plot_en: Elke, Ruth and Monica live together in the same house. Elke is a sexologist, her best friend Ruth wants to be a famous reporter. Monica is one of Elke's most active clients: she's rich, divorced and enjoys her freedom.

title: Happy Singles
